name: Red Sports Car
details: Scale: 1:24 | Material: Die-cast metal | Color: Red
description: Experience the thrill of speed with this sleek and stylish Red Sports Car. Its detailed design and high-quality construction make it a perfect addition to any toy car collection. Get ready for exciting racing adventures!

name: Blue Police Car
description: Protect and serve with the Blue Police Car! This toy car features realistic police lights and sounds, adding to the excitement of imaginative play. With its sturdy construction and cool design, it's perfect for little law enforcement enthusiasts.

name: Yellow School Bus
details: Scale: 1:48 | Material: Metal and plastic | Color: Yellow
description: All aboard the Yellow School Bus! This toy bus is a perfect replica of a classic school bus, complete with opening doors and realistic details. Let your child's imagination run wild as they drive their friends to school and embark on fun adventures.

name: Pink Party Bus
description: Get the party started with the Pink Party Bus! This glamorous toy bus is perfect for imaginative play and creating magical moments. With its vibrant color and fun features, it's an ideal addition to any toy collection and will make every adventure more exciting.

name: Green Monster Truck
description: Conquer any terrain with the Green Monster Truck! This rugged and powerful toy truck is built for action-packed adventures. Its oversized wheels and durable construction ensure hours of fun, making it a must-have for young thrill-seekers.

name: Yellow Construction Truck
details: Scale: 1:20 | Material: Die-cast metal and plastic | Color: Yellow
description: Dig, lift, and haul with the Yellow Construction Truck! This realistic toy truck is perfect for budding builders and construction enthusiasts. With its movable parts and authentic design, it brings the excitement of a construction site right into your child's hands.
